message.reminderDescription:
I've had a [new update](https://blog.discordsafe.com/Registro-de-cambios/version-4-2) where commands have been **renamed, updated and grouped**.
The new name of the command you are trying to use is below, thanks for using me!

guildMemberAdd.forceban: It is not in the forceban.
guildMemberAdd.captchaField2: This is to protect the server from spam bots and multi-accounts.
guildMemberAdd.captchaErrorTiempo: **Time is over**, you have not completed the verification so you will be kicked.
guildMemberAdd.captchaErrorIntentos: **You have reached the limit of attempts**, you have not completed the verification so you will be kicked.
guildMemberAdd.alertaDes: A member classified as malicious has entered your server
guildMemberAdd.alertaFooter: You can disable these alerts using {{prefix}}notifications
guildMemberAdd.alarma: The server **{{server}}** is on alarm mode and does not allow new users to enter, please try again in a few minutes.
guildMemberAdd.captchaField1: Before continuing, you must answer this **captcha**, do it to be able to access the server. You have **{{intentos}} attempts** and ** {{minutos}} minutes** to complete.
guildMemberAdd.captchacFooter: Do you want to invite me to your server? discordsafe.com/invite
guildMemberAdd.expulsado: You have been kicked from the server **{{server}}** because your account does not exceed the minimum of **{{age}}** days.
